com.sun.tools.doclets.util
Class Specifier

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.sun.tools.doclets.util.Specifier
public class Specifier
extends java.lang.Object

Foundation class for package and filename matching. Possible patterns include: 

    s       -- equals s
    s*      -- starts with s
    *s      -- ends with s
    *s*     -- contains s
    s1*s2   -- starts with s1, ends with s2
    s1*s2*  -- starts with s1, contains s2
    *s1*s2* -- contains s1 and s2
    etc.
Note:
A null pattern matches everything. The match(java.lang.String) function always returns true. However, when a null string, is compared to any pattern, the null string always returns false. (A null string matches nothing.) When a null string is compared to a null pattern, the result is false. (The null string takes precedence.)

Author:
Eric Armstrong
See Also:
PathSpecifier, FileSpecifier
